name: magidoc
description: MagiDoc is a documentation website generator for GraphQL based on Svelte and that allows for infinite customization through plugins.
author: Sunny Pelletier

scripts.build: pnpm -r --filter './packages/plugins/**' build && pnpm -r install --ignore-scripts --frozen-lockfile --strict-peer-dependencies && pnpm -r --filter '!./packages/plugins/**' build
scripts.build-docs: pnpm -r --filter './packages/plugins/**' build && pnpm -r install --ignore-scripts --frozen-lockfile --strict-peer-dependencies && pnpm -r --filter '@magidoc/docs' build
scripts.release: pnpm build && node packages/starters/zipStarters.cjs && pnpm -r release
scripts.patch: pnpm version --no-git-tag-version patch | xargs pnpm -r exec pnpm version --allow-same-version --no-git-tag-version && pnpm -r up '@magidoc/*'
scripts.minor: pnpm version --no-git-tag-version minor | xargs pnpm -r exec pnpm version --allow-same-version --no-git-tag-version && pnpm -r up '@magidoc/*'
scripts.major: pnpm version --no-git-tag-version major | xargs pnpm -r exec pnpm version --allow-same-version --no-git-tag-version && pnpm -r up '@magidoc/*'
